name: You Can Jump But You Cannot Swim
name_original: You Can Jump But You Cannot Swim
description:
A game that works as a half platformer and half RPG.

The full game is yet to come, but once every one or two weeks a new version of this game will be released until it is complete.

The game is being made using the Love 2D library for Lua. In order to play the small demonstration builds of this game, you will need to have Love 2D in your system.

This game will run on Windows, Mac and Linux, and it will be open source as well. All sprites and sounds can be modified, and you can even make your own little hack of this game. Isn't this fun?

You can follow me on Twitter for more updates: @Keleburr. Thanks for looking.
